name: volume-label-probability
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
FIND FREQUENCY OF VOLUME LABELS.

This command outputs a set of soft ROIs, one for each label in the input, where the value is how many of the input maps had that label at that voxel, divided by the number of input maps.

inputs.name: label_maps
inputs.description: volume label file containing individual label maps from many subjects

inputs.name: probability_out
inputs.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each voxel

inputs.name: opt_exclude_unlabeled
inputs.description: don't make a probability map of the unlabeled key

output-files.name: probability_out
output-files.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each voxel
